name: Morelos Salsa Verde
author: TAPATIA
summary: Hi!  I hope you enjoy this real, Mexican salsa from Morelos, Mexico.  This is my husband's recipe; we use it for taquitos, huevos rancheros, pork, chicken, or just for dipping!
ingredients: 1 teaspoon chicken bouillon granules, or salt
directions: Place tomatillos, jalapenos, and garlic in a large pot
Pour in just enough water to cover the tomatillos; they will float, so press them down with your hand as you measure the water
Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until the color of the tomatillos lightens to a yellow color, about 10 minutes
Remove from heat, and allow to cool for about 10 minutes
Strain the tomatillos, reserving the water
Place into the bowl of a blender; add the cloves, cumin, pepper, and chicken bouillon
Puree until smooth, use the reserved water as needed to adjust the consistency
